tool_description: Create a temporary email address for receiving messages without revealing your personal email.

api_list.name: Create an email
api_list.description: Make a request to create a new temporary email address.

api_list.name: Read Inbox
api_list.description: Retrieve messages from the inbox of a specified temporary email address.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The temporary email address to read messages from.
